|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = SOHO |revision = 6 |subrevision = BF4S16E5W |model_part_num = |page_start_date = February 12, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/WatchGuard_Firebox_SOHO_6_(BF4S16E5W) |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q6G-BF4S16E5W,M4Y-03251 |icid = 4657A-BF4S16E5W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Brecis;MSP2000; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 4Km |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 150 <!-- 150 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16400-7T; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = ADMtek;ADM6996; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = PCMCIA (16-bit) |exp_pcmcia_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = b
|defaulip = 192.168.111.1 |defaultlogin = user |defaultpass = pass |defaultssid = XXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^[0-9]{5}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 04/21/2008 |fccapprovdate = 06/17/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Z-Com XI-325 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1 = Intersil;ISL3873A; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-MMCX,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MADE IN TAIWAN" and "NEE 2M E98524" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :SerComm is the (very) likely OEM. [http://google.brand.edgar-online.com/EFX_dll/EDGARpro.dll?FetchFilingHtmlSection1?SectionID=2221088-10752-160161&SessionID=ZedAFS0AHfSA-A7]
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID is specified as the device's (5-digit) serial number. ''The first 4 digits are the product code and are not part of the SSID.'' ::Hex digits? <small>may be lower case letters, if so</small> The FCC test report specifies the power supply as an EPA-121DA-12 (12VDC, 1A).
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/v62SOHOUserGuide.pdf User guide] *[http://www.wi-fiplanet.com/reviews/AP/article.php/3070681/Firebox-SOHO-6-Wireless.htm Wi-Fi Planet review] *150MHz '''Brecis''' processor *16MB RAM
*[http://www.opentecme.com/productsWatchguardFBS6W.asp More specifications] *'''Brecis''' MSP2000 (150MHz) *4MB Flash *16MB RAM
[[Category:English Documentation]]
